channel.title: How do i increase the maximum drops in the drop.cfg file
channel.description:
Update
public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45]; // room for 15 drops per npc How do i modify this line to make a new maximum drops?
Come on how do i code in a second drop.cfg file or increase the maximum How do i increase the maximum drops in the drop.cfg file Right now the maximum drops per Npc is 15 I can't find anything to increase that number.
Delta Source if the matters. 317.
Or how do i code a second drop2.cfg file...

item.title: How do i increase the maximum drops in the drop.cfg file
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Sorry i wasnt being clear enough i have filled that up. I need A new Maximum… Max currently is 15 drops i filled that up i need about another 30 drops. It wont let me fill up more or else it sends me a error after loading the game not in the compiling stage.

I have coded it so it will actualy do 0-1000 so if i want 1% i would need to put 10. i understand your code its just not what i want.

Bump.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i increase the maximum drops in the drop.cfg file

item.title: How do i increase the maximum drops in the drop.cfg file
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

its in npcdrops.cfg

//mithril dragon
npcdrop = 72 7611 1 1

the “mithril dragon” your npc name.

npc drop = 72 , is your NP’s ID.

7611 - is item that it drops
the first “1” is the amount of that item
the second “1” is rarity. lets say its 5 , so it means that you have 5% chance of getting that item when u kill that npc

Read full topic
